website_summaries.verdict: This small piñata won't work for everyone, but it's worth considering for little kids as well as mermaid enthusiasts.
pros: Cute – parents report their little girls loving the mermaid design
Easy to fill, and holds up long enough to give multiple youngsters their turn at hitting it before the treats come spewing out
cons: Quite small, so it's not ideal for large groups of kids or those that would appreciate a more challenging piñata

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SMALL
customer_reviews.text: First the pictures make it look a lot bigger then what it is. Thanks god it’s just for a 2 yr olds birthday it’s that little. I thought it was a joke when I opened it. Then there is nothing telling you where to put the candy in at and the hole I think I found is on the bottom so cans is just falling out of it. There is no way these measurements are accurate. It’s that small!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Wayyyyyyy Too Small!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the TINIEST piñata I have ever seen. MIGHT fit one bag of candy—if that. Save your money—the design is cute, but this piñata is way too small to meet your needs. I returned and found a better and bigger piñata at my local dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Arhodes88

customer_reviews.title: Size too small, novelty item, not enough room for candy for kid party
customer_reviews.text: Horrible size for the price of this piñata. Its size is for a table display not for a kids birthday party. Returned the item got money back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: nory gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than typical piñatas
customer_reviews.text: Despite its small size, we stuffed a lot of candy and small toys in it and it worked fine for the eight kids who broke it open. I'd definitely want a bigger piñata for any more than that though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: The Pinata was very very small. Could not get much candy in. I could have bought two small bags of gum and it would filled it, not something I would buy for a party with more than three children. The Pinata itself was pretty and the kids loved it. The strings held through a number of pulls. Just very small inside and outtside
customer_reviews.author: mary h vosik

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I know it says small, and I saw the measurements, but I didn't have a concept of how small it actually is. Seeing it in person was a little disappointing for that reason. Other than that it seems to be a decent pinata.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The price for this piñata was a little high and especially when I received it and saw how tiny it was! The pictures are very deceiving. It was way too small of a piñata for my daughter’s birthday party and returned it for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: jeremi barber

customer_reviews.title: Small, cute , but hanger broke too easily
customer_reviews.text: I think it was decent sized for a 1 year old b.day party.It is very pretty too , but didn't last long.Didn't really have a chance for kids to hit it because where you hang the rope , broke off too easily .
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Good things come in smaller packages
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller but for the amount of kids and as close to Halloween the party was, it was a good size. The birthday girl loved it and was super excited and when it comes down to it that was the most important part.
customer_reviews.author: BAM in SAC

customer_reviews.title: Cute pinata
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this piñata. It is on the smaller side but has adequate sturdiness and fill space for about 6-8 kids I would say. Stood up to several rounds of hits by my 2 kids.
customer_reviews.author: KRinLB

customer_reviews.title: WAY TO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I guess I should've checked out the actual size...this product was WAY TO SMALL...I think we fit 12 total bite sized skittles, Starbursts, Swedish fish and smarties....We had to purchase another one to replace this one for my daughters 7th birthday...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Too Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but it is so small that there is no way to use it for a party. There is not enough time to get another before the party and it has really ruined what could have been the highlight of the party.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn I.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: The piñata was pretty small but worked just fine. It held together well - everyone got a chance to hit it a few times before big brother whacked it open. It was a little hard to stuff and didn’t told a ton but was enough. Easy to hang and even after brother broke it open, we hung it back up with tape so the birthday girl could hit it a few more times.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Small and breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: This piñata was very small! Just big enough for two bags of candy. Also, it broke right away! Wish it would have survived a few more hits so everyone had a chance to hit it.
customer_reviews.author: RoroB

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product. It is a little smaller than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s meh
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than expected and harder to break. The string ended up falling off
customer_reviews.author: Lianna

customer_reviews.title: cute but small
customer_reviews.text: This piñata was cute and matched perfect; it is pretty small though.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Daughter happy
customer_reviews.text: Served the purpose of what we wanted but was small. My daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie M

customer_reviews.title: A little piñata
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and well made.... its a little small, but my daughter adores it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Fox

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great size for a smaller party and is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: LindaAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Very unstable had to use lots of duck tape to reinforce
customer_reviews.author: Jay F.

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it was bigger. But it worked well for a mermaid themed 4th birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Rene’ Wright

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE!  TINY, TINY, TINY
customer_reviews.text: This thing is too small for even toddlers to enjoy. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: TPeo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Should've read the description better. Didn't realize it would be so small but very durable. Can hold about 2 to 3 bags of candy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Best for younger kids aged 3-5
customer_reviews.text: After a few small hits and a few big hits it hit the ground and exploded.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree cullum

customer_reviews.title: Not big
customer_reviews.text: It’s very tiny doesn’t hold Hardly any candy definitely not made for preteen birthday its smallest Piñata for the same price I can get bigger one at the store
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Its small. Holds very little candy.
customer_reviews.text: Very small. Even though I read how small it was, just warning you its smaller than you think.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Product was very tiny not worth your money could buy one for the same price and three times the size at dollar store
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This product was extremely small. I returned it because I could have gotten a better one at party city for the same price. The package came damaged and the piñata was even bent!
customer_reviews.author: DANIELLA P.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It was really small I guess i didn't read the description like I should of
customer_reviews.author: Chyann

customer_reviews.title: It is TINY
customer_reviews.text: Cute but super tiny, I have a party for 12 kids and this piñata will NOT DO
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: Piñata
customer_reviews.text: It was actual smaller then the picture showed but it turned out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Corsica whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: In 1 hit, the pinata disconnected from the part that hung the pinata and had to shake everything out.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Patitucci

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Kids had a blast trying to bust this thing open and built very well cause it took a while
customer_reviews.author: Renesa

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for return my money
customer_reviews.text: Too small and late arrival, also box was broken, l still waiting for my refund but take too mucha time, still waiting
customer_reviews.author: Rocio

customer_reviews.title: Really small
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to read the measurements.!!!!!! Please bc i didn’t and this is the smallest piñata I’d ever seen
customer_reviews.author: aprilwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for 5 years old and under . We had a blast with it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Earlene Brown

customer_reviews.title: VERY SMALL READ THE MEASUREMENTS!
customer_reviews.text: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED, NEVER THOUGHT TO READ THE MEASUREMENTS. THIS PINATA IS TINY!!
customer_reviews.author: DONNA BALDWIN

product_meta.title: Small Mermaid Pinata for Birthday Party Supplies (15.8 x 11.5 x 3.1 Inches)
product_meta.description: Do you have kids who love mermaids? Or perhaps you just like to have a pinata on hand for fun parties. This purple mermaid pinata will be a big hit at parties. Just open at the indicated spot and fill with candies, toys, or other treats. The pinata is made from cardstock as the frame and tissue paper for decoration. It comes with a little loop for easy hanging. Display it from the ceiling or a tree branch with some string, and let kids and adults alike try their hands at breaking it open for some tasty treats! Kids love bashing it until the candy falls out! It measures 15.75 x 11.5 x 3.125 inches.
feature_bullets: BIRTHDAY PARTY PIÑATA : Fill the mini piñata with candies, mini toys, and confetti and break them open to surprise your fellow party-goers or your kids; fillers not included
QUALITY MATERIAL: Made of brightly colored tissue paper and cardstock
EASY TO FILL: There is a marker on the pinata that tells you where to fill it up with candy
MERMAID PARTY SUPPLIES: This piñata is just the thing to combine with other mermaid decorations for a whimsical mermaid birthday party
DIMENSIONS: The mermaid pinata measures 15.75 x 11.5 x 3.125 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars268 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
